Network Security & Monitoring.name: Fortinet FortiGate
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Network Firewall. Not directly installable via UHT. Refer to Fortinet documentation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Palo Alto Networks Firewall
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Next-Generation Firewall. Not directly installable via UHT. Refer to Palo Alto Networks documentation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Cisco ASA
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Adaptive Security Appliance (Firewall/VPN). Not directly installable via UHT. Refer to Cisco documentation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Check Point Firewall
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Network Security Gateway. Not directly installable via UHT. Refer to Check Point documentation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Sophos XG Firewall
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Next-Generation Firewall. Not directly installable via UHT. Refer to Sophos documentation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Cloudflare WAF
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Cloud-based Web Application Firewall. Managed via Cloudflare dashboard.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Akamai WAF
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Cloud-based Web Application Firewall. Managed via Akamai platform.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: pfSense
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Open source firewall/router software distribution. Typically installed as an OS.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: OPNsense
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Open source firewall/router software distribution, a fork of pfSense. Typically installed as an OS.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: ModSecurity
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Open source Web Application Firewall (WAF) engine. Often integrated with Apache/Nginx.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Snort
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Open Source Intrusion Prevention System (IPS) and Intrusion Detection System (IDS). Requires complex compilation from source or package manager install.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Suricata
Network Security & Monitoring.description: High performance Network IDS, IPS and Network Security Monitoring engine. Requires complex compilation from source or package manager install.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Zeek (formerly Bro)
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Powerful network analysis framework that transforms network traffic into highly-detailed, scriptable logs. Requires compilation.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Wireshark
Network Security & Monitoring.description: The worldâ€™s foremost and widely used network protocol analyzer. Download from official site: https://www.wireshark.org/download.html

Network Security & Monitoring.name: tcpdump
Network Security & Monitoring.description: A powerful command-line packet analyzer. Often pre-installed on Linux/Unix systems.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Security Onion
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Free and open platform for threat hunting, enterprise security monitoring, and log management. Requires dedicated OS installation. Download ISO from official site: https://securityonion.net/

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE)
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Network Access Control (NAC) solution. Not directly installable via UHT.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Fortinet FortiNAC
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Commercial Network Access Control (NAC) solution. Not directly installable via UHT.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: OpenVPN
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Open-source software application that implements virtual private network (VPN) techniques.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: WireGuard
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Modern, fast, and secure VPN tunnel.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Cisco Umbrella (OpenDNS)
Network Security & Monitoring.description: Cloud security platform that provides DNS-layer security. Managed via web console.

Network Security & Monitoring.name: Pi-hole
Network Security & Monitoring.description: A Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application. Requires Raspberry Pi or Linux server. Installation via official script.

Endpoint Security.name: CrowdStrike Falcon
Endpoint Security.description: Highly demanded commercial EDR platform. Requires subscription and agent deployment. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (XDR)
Endpoint Security.description: Microsoft's enterprise endpoint security platform. Part of Microsoft 365 Defender. Built-in or deployed via management tools.

Endpoint Security.name: SentinelOne
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial AI-powered EDR platform. Requires subscription and agent deployment. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Carbon Black (VMware)
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial endpoint protection and EDR solution. Requires subscription and agent deployment. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Sophos Intercept X
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial endpoint protection with EDR and anti-ransomware. Requires subscription and agent deployment. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Bitdefender GravityZone
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial endpoint security platform. Requires subscription and agent deployment. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Windows Defender
Endpoint Security.description: Microsoft's built-in antivirus and endpoint protection for Windows. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: Malwarebytes
Endpoint Security.description: Popular anti-malware software. Download from official site: https://www.malwarebytes.com/

Endpoint Security.name: Avast/AVG
Endpoint Security.description: Popular antivirus software. Download from official sites.

Endpoint Security.name: Kaspersky
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial antivirus and internet security suite. Download from official site.

Endpoint Security.name: Norton
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial antivirus and internet security suite. Download from official site.

Endpoint Security.name: Tripwire
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) solution. Not directly installable via UHT.

Endpoint Security.name: OSSEC
Endpoint Security.description: Open Source Host-based Intrusion Detection System (HIDS). Complex installation/configuration.

Endpoint Security.name: Wazuh
Endpoint Security.description: Open Source Security Platform (HIDS, SIEM, XDR capabilities). Complex installation/configuration.

Endpoint Security.name: Microsoft Intune
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial Mobile Device Management (MDM) and Endpoint Management solution. Cloud service.

Endpoint Security.name: Jamf Pro
Endpoint Security.description: Commercial Apple device management (MDM) solution. Cloud service.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Nessus
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Proprietary vulnerability scanner developed by Tenable, Inc. Download from official site: https://www.tenable.com/downloads/nessus

Vulnerability Scanning.name: OpenVAS / GVM
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Vulnerability management platform with comprehensive scanning and reporting capabilities. Often deployed via Docker. Refer to Greenbone documentation for detailed setup: https://greenbone.github.io/

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Qualys
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Commercial cloud-based platform for vulnerability management and compliance. Managed via web console.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Nexpose (Rapid7)
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Commercial vulnerability management solution by Rapid7. Not directly installable via UHT.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Burp Suite Community Edition
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Integrated platform for performing security testing of web applications. Download from official site: https://portswigger.net/burp/communitydownload Requires Java.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: OWASP ZAP
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Open Source Web Application Security Scanner. Download from official site or install via package manager for some distros (e.g., 'apt install zaproxy'). Requires Java.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Acunetix
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Commercial web vulnerability scanner. Not directly installable via UHT.

Vulnerability Scanning.name: Invicti (formerly Netsparker)
Vulnerability Scanning.description: Commercial web vulnerability scanner. Not directly installable via UHT.

Exploitation.name: SQLMap
Exploitation.description: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.

Exploitation.name: Metasploit Framework
Exploitation.description: World's most used penetration testing framework. Installation can be lengthy and complex.

Exploitation.name: Evil-WinRM
Exploitation.description: A WinRM shell for pentesters. Requires Ruby and specific gems.
post_install_commands: gem install winrm winrm-fs rubyntlm rkerberos gssapi_sspi

Exploitation.name: Pwncat
Exploitation.description: Netcat on steroids with a Python reverse shell and advanced features.

Exploitation.name: Cobalt Strike
Exploitation.description: Commercial Red Team Operations and APT Simulation platform. Purchase and download from official site: https://www.cobaltstrike.com/

Exploitation.name: BloodHound
Exploitation.description: Active Directory reconnaissance and path enumeration tool. Requires Neo4j database (manual setup recommended).

Exploitation.name: Immunity Debugger
Exploitation.description: A powerful, free debugger for malware analysis and exploit development (Windows only). Download from: https://www.immunityinc.com/products/debugger/

Exploitation.name: OllyDbg
Exploitation.description: A 32-bit assembler level analyzing debugger for Microsoft Windows. Download from: http://www.ollydbg.de/

Web Hacking.name: GoBuster
Web Hacking.description: Directory/file & DNS busting tool written in Go. Requires Go to be installed.

Web Hacking.name: W3af
Web Hacking.description: Web Application Attack and Audit Framework. Requires Python.

Web Hacking.name: BeEF (Browser Exploitation Framework)
Web Hacking.description: The Browser Exploitation Framework Project. Requires Ruby.

Privilege Escalation.name: LinPEAS
Privilege Escalation.description: Local Linux Privilege Escalation Awesome Script.

Privilege Escalation.name: WinPEAS
Privilege Escalation.description: Local Windows Privilege Escalation Awesome Script.

Privilege Escalation.name: Privilege Escalation Awesome Scripts (PEASS-ng)
Privilege Escalation.description: All-in-one suite for local privilege escalation. Contains LinPEAS, WinPEAS etc. See individual scripts for usage. GitHub repo provides source.

Privilege Escalation.name: GTFOBins
Privilege Escalation.description: Curated list of Unix binaries that can be exploited to bypass local security restrictions. Access via web: https://gtfobins.github.io/

Privilege Escalation.name: HackTricks (PrivEsc Section)
Privilege Escalation.description: Comprehensive collection of penetration testing and ethical hacking tricks, including privilege escalation techniques. Access via web: https://book.hacktricks.xyz/privilege-escalation

Payloads.name: Msfvenom
Payloads.description: A payload generator, part of Metasploit Framework. Requires Metasploit Framework to be installed.

Payloads.name: PoshC2
Payloads.description: A powershell C2 framework for Red Teams.

Wordlists.name: SecLists
Wordlists.description: A collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments.

Wordlists.name: Rockyou
Wordlists.description: A famous wordlist for password cracking. Often included in Kali Linux or can be found online. Decompress if needed (e.g., 'gzip -d rockyou.txt.gz').

Phishing.name: SocialFish
Phishing.description: Phishing Tool and Social Engineering Tool.

Phishing.name: Setoolkit (Social-Engineer Toolkit)
Phishing.description: Open-source penetration testing framework designed for social engineering.

Phishing.name: GoPhish
Phishing.description: Open-source phishing framework. Download from GitHub releases or official site.

Password Cracking.name: John the Ripper
Password Cracking.description: Fast password cracker. Requires compilation from source. Refer to official documentation for build instructions: https://www.openwall.com/john/

Password Cracking.name: Hashcat
Password Cracking.description: World's fastest and most advanced password recovery utility. GPU-accelerated. Download from official site: https://hashcat.net/hashcat/

Password Cracking.name: Hydra
Password Cracking.description: A very fast network logon cracker which supports numerous protocols to attack.

Wireless Hacking.name: Aircrack-ng
Wireless Hacking.description: A complete suite of tools to assess WiFi network security.
post_install_commands: cd {{install_path}} && autoreconf -i && ./configure --with-libnl && make && sudo make install && sudo airodump-ng-oui-update

Reconnaissance.name: Nmap
Reconnaissance.description: Network scanner and security auditing tool.

Reconnaissance.name: Sublist3r
Reconnaissance.description: Fast subdomain enumeration tool for penetration testers.

Reconnaissance.name: Amass
Reconnaissance.description: OWASP Amass is a network mapping tool that can discover domains and subdomains. Requires Go to be installed and configured in PATH.

Reconnaissance.name: TheHarvester
Reconnaissance.description: OSINT tool for gathering emails, subdomains, hosts, employee names, open ports, etc.

Reconnaissance.name: Maltego
Reconnaissance.description: Open-source intelligence and graphical link analysis tool. Download from official site: https://www.maltego.com/downloads/ Requires Java.

Reconnaissance.name: Shodan CLI
Reconnaissance.description: Command-line interface for the Shodan search engine. Install with 'pip install shodan'. After installation, run 'shodan init YOUR_API_KEY' to configure (replace YOUR_API_KEY).

Reconnaissance.name: Recon-ng
Reconnaissance.description: Full-featured reconnaissance framework designed with the goal of providing a powerful environment to conduct open source web-based reconnaissance.

Reconnaissance.name: SpiderFoot
Reconnaissance.description: Open source intelligence (OSINT) automation tool. Integrates with many data sources.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Splunk Enterprise Security
SIEM & SOAR.description: Industry-leading commercial SIEM platform. Requires Splunk Enterprise. Not directly installable via UHT.

SIEM & SOAR.name: IBM QRadar
SIEM & SOAR.description: Commercial SIEM platform by IBM. Not directly installable via UHT.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Microsoft Sentinel
SIEM & SOAR.description: Cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution by Microsoft Azure. Managed via Azure portal.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Elastic SIEM (Elastic Stack)
SIEM & SOAR.description: Open-source SIEM capabilities built on the Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats). Download from official site: https://www.elastic.co/downloads Requires Java.

SIEM & SOAR.name: ArcSight (Micro Focus)
SIEM & SOAR.description: Commercial SIEM platform. Not directly installable via UHT.

SIEM & SOAR.name: LogRhythm
SIEM & SOAR.description: Commercial SIEM and security analytics platform. Not directly installable via UHT.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Wazuh (Open Source HIDS/SIEM)
SIEM & SOAR.description: Open Source Security Platform (HIDS, SIEM, XDR capabilities). Complex installation/configuration.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XSOAR

SIEM & SOAR.name: IBM Resilient
SIEM & SOAR.description: Commercial Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) platform by IBM. Not directly installable via UHT.

SIEM & SOAR.name: Swimlane
SIEM & SOAR.description: Commercial Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) platform. Not directly installable via UHT.
